trait_additional_properties_json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
trait_additional_properties_json.title: Has additional properties

trait_platform_pitch_event_json.description: Trait that represents an update event for a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

note.description: Optional note associated with this update.

status.description: The current status of the pitch.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made this update.

trait_platform_pitch_event_json.title: Platform pitch event

trait_platform_pitch_json.description: Trait that represents a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

platform_path.description: The path of the platform that this pitch targets.

trait_platform_pitch_json.title: Platform pitch

trait_publication_pitch_event_json.description: Trait that represents an update event for a pitch to a publication. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

edition_id.description: The ID of the publication edition that this pitch targets.

edition_time.description: The time of the publication edition that this pitch targets.

note.description: Optional note associated with this update.

status.description: The current status of the pitch.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made this update.

trait_publication_pitch_event_json.title: Publication pitch event

trait_publication_pitch_json.description: Trait that represents a pitch to a publication. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

publication_id.description: The ID of the publication that this pitch targets.

trait_publication_pitch_json.title: Publication pitch

schema.description: Trait that represents a story's pitches. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

platform.description: A list of the story's pitches to a platform.

publication.description: A list of the story's pitches to a publication.

schema.title: Pitches
